english_example_sentence: Mothers, may they always hold their children's hands tightly.
russian_example_sentence: Матери, пусть они всегда крепко держат руки своих детей.
turkish_example_sentence: Anneler, çocuklarının ellerini her zaman sıkı tutalar.
